quote: The wise learn many things from their enemies. – Aristophanes
fact: If done perfectly, a rubix cube combination can be solved in 17 turns.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: We all know where the Big Apple is but does anyone know where the Minneapolis?
